title: Strengthening Nursing Practice Competencies: Music-Based Business English: Learning Through Music and Projects

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic English vocabulary and grammar (middle school level)
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can acquire and contextually apply over 200 business-related vocabulary terms by analyzing English song lyrics.
Learners can fluently construct workplace expressions (e.g., email writing, meeting facilitation) in English through rap/melody creation.
Learners can pass role-play and presentation evaluations related to job functions through team-based music projects (music video production).
Learners can enhance global business acumen by understanding cultural contexts embedded in English music.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
